data.title: University Centre for Academic English
data.text:
Newspapers

Staff and students at The University of Manchester can access a wide range of online resources, including newspapers, via The University of Manchester Library databases page.

Visit the UoM Library databases

Newspapers contain a lot of interesting stories which can help to improve your language skills, particularly with reading. You do not need to understand every single word in a text as long as you can get the main idea, and reading newspapers is an ideal way of developing these skills.

Get started by exploring some of the newspaper websites below:

UK national newspapers

The Express

The Financial Times

The Guardian

The Independent

The Observer

The Telegraph

The Times

International newspapers
